name: Install Fee Tycoon
description:
Addictive Idle Gameplay

Install Fee Tycoon is a satirical Idle Clicker -- Click, Click, Click to make money. Spend your money on upgrades to make money faster. The more you make, the faster you'll make more!

Chaos3D, The popular game engine, has started charging developers each time their games are installed in a bid to increase their stock price. They have also reached out to you, a notorious software pirate. Why? So that they can pay you to re-install those same games, of course! Scam unwitting developers: get rich, and destroy the video game industry in the process!

Minigames!

In most Idle games, you can purchase "Buildings" to increase your production. In Install Fee Tycoon, that takes the form of "Dark Web Contacts" which will run more reinstalls for you. However, each of these contacts has problems; whether their computer is choked with spyware, or they want you to hack into a bank's website, there's lots to do, and lots of hidden upgrades to unlock!
